title: Connection issues 26/4/2015
body:
Been having issues with connecting but 3 times in a row I timed out before getting to lobby now I got a ban for declining too many games.

Played 3-4 games today no issue.

Anyone else having connectivity issues or is it just a 7.30 peak traffic kinda thing?

replies.body: Yeah the last 3 days around 6.30 my time my league lags bad. Never had an issue before my character slides around the screen for about 30sec and I cant cast anything.

Same sh!t tonight. Timed out in champ select and locked out for 6 mins.

Suck my balls.
same here entered ranked crashed in loading screen and when i try to connect it says cant connect to the server
